name: Kiss or Kill VR
description:
Welcome to Kiss or Kill, the ultimate trivia showdown filled with big choices and crazy shenanigans! Answer fast-paced questions, but watch out for your opponent who can do whatever it takes to win.

* Player vs. player
* Mini games
* Live human host or AI host
* Weekly tournaments with real prizes!

Every week is a new tournament!

Qualify:
* To qualify, play (and finish) at least one game between Sunday and Saturday morning (6 days)
* Qualifying games will continue to be organized on Discord
* Play as many qualifying games as you want and your single best score ranks your start position in the semi-finals

Semi-finals:
* Tournament semi-finals start every Saturday at 6pm PST
* You have to be in the game, ready to go, before 6:09PST where you’ll be automatically matched for two semi-final games with an AI host
* If you join after 6:09 you can still watch the games live in VR and chat in the new meeting room

Finals:
* The top two players from the semi-finals (based on score) move on to the finals which is a human hosted game
* Scores are cumulative from the semi-finals through the finals, highest score wins
* Each month there will be a larger tournament for the top weekly players with bigger prizes and surprises

Misc:
* During the semi finals and finals, you can hang out with all other players in our new meeting room with live voice chat so join early and stay late!
* You can spectate live in VR and the finals will be streamed on Twitch
* You can stream your qualifying and semi final games
* As we continue to expand there will be regionalized tournaments and semi-final times, but for now it will be 6pm PST on Saturdays
* If at 6:09 there is an odd number of players, the RLTY CHK account will participate with a random person we find in the office or off the street
